title: What a trip
description: Never get tired of rewatching this and noticing things I missed the first time around!

title: Best Batman movie hands down
description: Christian Bale & Heath Ledger were phenomenal in this movie

title: One of my favorite Star Wars movies
description: My favorite part of this movie is when the empire strikes back... really didn't see that one coming.

title: I suddenly forget the name of this movie
description: I was gonna leave a review but then I remembered I can't talk about it.

title: Epic fighting scenes
description: The one scene where Neo dodged the bullets was insane, Keanu Reeves must have trained incredibly hard to pull that one off!

title: So many twists & turns in the plot!
description: You're probably going to get lost watching this the first time around, so if you miss a scene you should probably rewind it.

title: Watching from my cell
description: After watching this, I'm gonna go ahead and try digging my own tunnel out of here and see if it works!
